title: I have a dream! A dream for a pacifist MafiaTWOW!

fields.name: Blunt Knife:
fields.value: Attack someone. As your Attack Power is negative, all attack scores on your targeted player are subtracted by -1.4x your score.

fields.name: Bandage (Locked, 100%):
fields.value: This ability unlocks when you reach the top three. This ability can be multitasked. When you use this ability, Blunt Knife can "attack" one extra player.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Nullify every single attack made in a round.
